radiographic_examinations.findings: No focal liver lesions; no intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation; no filling defects in biliary ducts; gallbladder shows wall thickening and irregular mucosa with edema in adjacent periportal fat; multiple small stones in gallbladder measuring up to 10 mm; mild soft tissue edema about pancreatic body and tail; right extrarenal pelvis has a 15 mm filling defect; borderline spleen size of 12.9 cm; trace ascites about the liver; no lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Similar to the prior recent CT of the body and tail.
